001000_00100_00000_0000000000000000		//addi $a0, $r0, 0
001000_10010_00000_0000000000000101 	//loop:	addi $s1, $r0, 5
000000_10001_10010_10001_00000_100000	//add $s2, $s1, $s2
100011_00100_10011_0000000000000000		//lw $s3, 0($a0)
000100_10011_10001_0000000000000001		//beq $s3, $s1 ,finish
000010_00000000000000000000000010		//j loop
101011_00100_10001_0000000000000100		//finish:sw $s1, 4($a0)
101011_00100_01010_0000000000001000		//sw $s2, 8($a0)
